description: You should only use Hauptwerk's native component installer to install the COMPPKG_HAUPTWERK_RAR file. Do not use using third-party RAR software to extract or install component packages. To install a component package, select File â†’ Install organ or temperament... , navigate to your component package, and click Open .
NOTE: The component package file may also appear with the more common "comppkg.hauptwerk.rar" extension.
